message.raw:
Added support for --order-tracks and --order-labels options to
segtools-signal-distribution. Also fixed a bug in the installation
script. R Library installation was failing because RPy2 was unable
to find the R shared libraries. Turns out, the R installation wasn't
setting R_HOME or LD_LIBRARY_PATH, so both these should now be set
during the installation process.

message:
Added support for --order-tracks and --order-labels options to
segtools-signal-distribution. Also fixed a bug in the installation
script. R Library installation was failing because RPy2 was unable
to find the R shared libraries. Turns out, the R installation wasn't
setting R_HOME or LD_LIBRARY_PATH, so both these should now be set
during the installation process.
